title: Chase 2
description: Cassidy Arbor had fought tooth and nail for everything she had in life. Why did she ever think holding onto Chase would be any different? She had given up everything for him, and he had deserted her when she needed him most.Knowing the immense damage he'd caused to everyone around him, Chase chose to disappear and lick his wounds, leaving the only family he'd ever known, and the woman who'd captured his heart. How could things possibly get worse?Chase 2 is the unforgettable final chapter of the all-consuming passion that ignited between Chase and Cassidy.
author: Kiara Delaney
